title: Kathy Hilton
summary: Kathleen Elizabeth Hilton (née  Avanzino; formerly Richards; born March 13, 1959) is an American socialite, fashion designer, actress, and television personality. She is the mother of socialite Paris Hilton and fashion designer Nicky Hilton and the half sister of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills stars Kim Richards and Kyle Richards. Since 2021, Hilton has also starred on that series.
